content: the next stitch used on both cuff-down and toe-up socks i knitwise to the right hand needle twice slip have included a link to the pattern on ravelry both stitches back to the left hand needle opposite of course you can replace this heel and knit together through the back loop with whichever you prefer just bear in mind st/sts stitch/stitches that your leg measurement will depend on * * repeat from * to * your heel selection i have written it for the fish lips kiss heel stitch counts are written for s m l as per sizing on the previous page all content © 2018 julieanne cole 3 www lovebirdlane com | hello@lovebirdlane com cuff foot co 56 64 72 sts using the long-tail cast on begin knitting in stockinette in-the-round again see video tutorial links on page 3 and continue until the foot measures 2 5 shorter than foot length required being careful not to twist your stitches join for working in the round and place your bor proceed to toe instructions marker round 1 toe k2 p2 to end note if using a 9 circular i would divide the stitches onto 3 dpns half the stitches on the repeat round 1 for 23 more rounds 24 rounds first needle a quarter of the stitches on the other total ~2 or until cuff is desired length two needles proceed to leg instructions round 1 *k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1* repeat once four sts decrease d leg start knitting in stockinette knit all stitches and round 2 continue until the leg measures 7 or desired k to end length repeat these two rounds 9 times more until 16 proceed to heel 24 32 sts remain proceed to finishing instructions heel knit 28 32 36 sts finishing perform the fish lips kiss heel or heel of evenly divide your stitches across two dpns choice across the second half of the stitches and perform the kitchener stitch to close the hole in the toe see video tutorial links on proceed to foot instructions page 3 weave in all ends and block enjoy your cozy new socks all content © 2018 julieanne cole 4 www lovebirdlane com | hello@lovebirdlane com thank you for knitting along connect on ravelry www ravelry com/designers/julieanne-cole instagram www instagram com/lovebirdlane www instagram com/anneofjulie facebook www facebook com/lovebirdlaneyarns youtube www youtube com/c/mymuddlingspodcast website www lovebirdlane com pattern support/contact hello@lovebirdlane com share your projects with me tag your photos on social media with #lovebirdlanedesigns create a project page on ravelry and if you like join in on the lovebird lane yarns ravelry group www ravelry com/groups/lovebird-lane-yarns lovebird lane
